name: Oaks & Pines (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
Keep the forest alive by getting rid of the bad grass and preventing the trees from burning.

Controls :

Left click to place the item in the top of the list.

We are 3 french art students.

-  Félix Metzinger : Game Design & Coding (https://www.instagram.com/le_vaisseau_spatial/)

- Sarah Germain : Art (https://www.instagram.com/lapersillade/)

- Guilin Braïda : Music (https://www.instagram.com/guilin_braida/)

Edit : updated the browser version so it works on android touchscreen devices (firefox for me).
